actions.name: Pastel Veil
actions.description: Effect:The user is immune to the @Affliction[poison] and @Affliction[blight] Afflictions. Allied creatures in range have their @Affliction[poison] and @Affliction[blight] Affliction duration reduce by 2 at the end of each of their activations instead of 1.

system.description: Effect:The user is immune to the @Affliction[poison] and @Affliction[blight] Afflictions. Allied creatures in range have their @Affliction[poison] and @Affliction[blight] Affliction duration reduce by 2 at the end of each of their activations instead of 1.
